item.title: About the Workshop
item.description: SisterAnalyst is pleased to announce our Open Data challenge workshop, in partnership with the Open Heroines initiative - a visible platform for women to express their thoughts, ideas and critiques. When: Monday, March 09, 2020 5:00 PM to 8:00 PM Where: AFA, Gospodar Jovanova 2 11000 Belgrade, Serbia The event is free, but registration is required by filling this form ðŸ‘‰ðŸ“„ Our aim is to fully democratise open data, we believe that Open Data portals should not simply focus on just providing data.
